response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. After careful consideration, I have decided to extend this exclusive offer to you at a price of $750,000. This exceptional item not only represents a significant investment but also promises to enrich your life in ways that are both meaningful and memorable. I trust that you will appreciate its true worth and consider this proposal favorably. Should you require any further information or clarification, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of discussing this opportunity with you in greater detail.", "product_price": 750000}
